name: Clan monsters
description:
Clan monsters is a game in which you have to use your dexterity and reliable weapons to destroy monsters that appear from portals. Different types of weapons will be given you for completing levels. BTW weapons are not the only thing that the game will reward you with.
There will also be various improvements and protective spheres. Each monster needs its own approach. Be careful hunter, so as not to become a prey!

-Beautiful graphics
-Interesting gameplay
-Several types of weapons

Fire, monster a lot of levels with different platforms! There is easy controls system. All these things will give you best experience about game!

There are a lot of interesting things waiting for you in this platformer - jumping on platforms, climbing ladders, collecting items necessary to defeat enemies or complete a level.
